name: an12i
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: mpbir(wa(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(w1, wa(w0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wa(w0, wa(w1, w2))
-| wa(w1, wa(w0, w2))
-| wb(wa(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(w1, wa(w0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wa(w0, wa(w1, w2))
-| wa(w1, wa(w0, w2))
-| wb(wa(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(w1, wa(w0, w2)))

body.origin: |- wb(wa(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(w1, wa(w0, w2)))

comment: An inference from commuting operands in a chain of conjunctions. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 22-May-2019.)
